articles.author: Kevin Liptak, CNN
articles.title: Biden's preaching the benefits of democracy in Europe, but new concerns rise back home - CNN
articles.description: President Joe Biden's attempts to talk up democracy in Europe this week are facing headwinds from back home, where revelations about the Justice Department's attempts to obtain Democrats' data have raised new concerns about the state of American politics.

articles.title: Dispute over Northern Ireland protocol threatened to derail G7 summit for Boris Johnson - Independent.ie
articles.description: UK Prime Minister Boris Johnson will hold talks with the European Union’s key players on Saturday as the dispute over Northern Ireland’s post-Brexit trading arrangements threatened to derail his hosting of the G7 summit.

articles.author: Sky
articles.title: Venus: European Space Agency mission aims to unlock mysteries of 'Earth's twin' - Sky News
articles.description: Venus is the most Earth-like planet in size, composition and distance to our sun - but its surface is about 450C (842F).
